instruction: Generate an appropriate response to the given instruction and input with an overall length of less than 100 words.
input:
Instruction: Describe the experience of opening an online store.
Input:
I recently opened an online store that specializes in handmade items.
output: Opening my online store was an exhilarating experience! Planning it out, creating the website, listing my products, and developing product descriptions kept me busy for weeks leading up to the launch. Once it was ready, I proudly shared it with my friends and family and watched it blossom as people started buying my products. Of course, I faced some challenges along the way, but it was all worth it for this unforgettable experience.
